issue.title: [CF 220] New icon type:Spell Alert
issue.body:
One example:
Kyx casts Power Word: Shield to Kyx.
UnitA casts SpellA to UnitB

If unitA="player" and SpellA="some Instant Cast spells" and unitB="party1" then condition pass.

The old "Spell Cast" don't have destination target function(like the unitB) and it's only checked "No Instant Cast"

Sorry for my bad english!
thanks for you hard work.
/kiss

additional:
This can add 2 options like the ICD icon
Spell Cast Start: when spells begins casting or channeled spells begins casting.
Spell Cast Finish:when spells cast finish or when instant cast spells are cast.

-.-at last add the spell casts target.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #220 | Raw

comments.body:
One more thing, I think need add a timer for the "condition icon", 0 is normal, when condition passed if numeric greater than 0 then show the icon for X seconds.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

The thing about this is that the target of a spell is very difficult to determine. Blizzard intentionally blocks the targets of hostile player's spell casts from the API to prevent abuse - and this would be 95% of the usage of such a feature. I suppose your example was just an example, as I don't see much practical application in an icon telling you what you cast a spell on, but would there be any practical use for determining friendly players' cast targets?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Is this possible to check like below?
1.check for unit start casting a spell
2.check for unit's target
If unit don't have any API like party1target/target/focus/etc,Ignore 1-2 only show icon when spell cast finish and conditon passed.
3.instant cast spells "cast on target" and a timer for the "condition icon"

-.-...

Edited Jun 5, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

The only problem with that is that you don't have to target what you are casting on - and with CC/silences/etc in arena/PvP, this is about 70% of the time. Most use mouseover macros or /cast [@arena1], etc.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

1. Add new option for Spell Cast(instant cast/spell cast finish),If checked "instant cast/spell cast finish" will show the CastingOnTarget or Warning This TargetUnit Only work for "instant cast/spell cast finish"
  2. Add a timer for the "condition icon"

Is this possible?

Edited Jun 5, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Adding a timer to condition icons would require a pretty big rewrite of conditions, so I probably won't be doing that any time soon (although I have thought about it before)

As for spell cast target detection, it depends on the reaction of who is casting the spell relative to the player, not just the unit token (target, arena1, etc) assigned.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Last night I installed many addons to find something like that, I think one thing looks like POWA's "Spell Alert"is what i want to say. (I checked "only cast on me", sometimes this option is useful.)

If this is difficult to do, forget it.

At last, thanks for your time and consideration.^o^

Edited Jun 6, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

I think that a "spell alert" would be best implemented as a separate icon type - and would be pretty easy that way. Or maybe just combine it into the cast icon type - similar to item cooldowns piggybacking off of cooldown icons


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

New icon type "spell alert" is Good idea.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

I don't remember much about this ticket. Timers have been put in for condition icons; open new tickets for anything else that is still needed.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
